Frequently Asked Questions

How do I post a sailboat for sale?

Posting your sailboat for sale on Sailing Texas is free! Visit our Post Free Ad page to get started. Include clear photos and a detailed description for best results.

Is listing my boat really free?

Yes! Sailing Texas has always offered free sailboat classified ads. We believe in supporting the sailing community.

How long will my ad stay active?

Ads remain active until you sell your boat or ask us to remove the listing. We recommend updating your ad periodically to keep it fresh.

Can I advertise my business on Sailing Texas?

Yes! We offer advertising opportunities for sailing-related businesses. Contact us at contact@sailingtexas.com to discuss options.

About Sailing Texas

Founded in 2003, Sailing Texas has grown to become one of the premier resources for sailboat classifieds and sailing information in Texas. With over 20,000 boats in our photo gallery, we're dedicated to helping sailors find their perfect boat.
